aboutPage.presentation:

I am a creative front-end developer
aboutPage.shortMessage: I work in the field of software development for over 6 years. I have partecipated in more than 15 projects with clients and companies of various sizes, both in the private sector and in public administration
aboutPage.shortMessageExperience: These experiences have allowed me to acquire and improve technical skills as well as soft skills.

webDev.title: Web development
webDev.description: Creation of customized and responsive front-end projects, accessible using the best JavaScript technologies (Angular, React, Typescript)

ecommerce.title: eCommerce
ecommerce.description: I implement and develop high-performing and secure business solutions aimed at ensuring the best shopping experience to convert users into loyal customers.

webApplications.title: Web Applications
webApplications.description: I specialize in developing web applications optimized to meet the client\'s needs. The goal is to create business solutions to maximize efficiency, productivity, and digitization of every process.
